name: Toilet In Wonderland
description:
Toilet in Wonderland is an adventure game where a constipated girl named Mira explores a toilet-filled Wonderland inhabited with many wacky characters. This game was made for the annual VIP RPG Red-and-White 2010 festival, an event where many VIP community members gather together and create fun RPG Maker games for each other to play. In the end, all 102 games made for this event were voted on and Toilet in Wonderland placed second.

When Team Nonsense commented on their game winning second place, they had this to say: “Although this was my first time participating in this festival, I had a great time with it and gained a lot of good memories. To everyone who played my game, to those who voted for me, and to the webmaster who published my work, I want to say thank you all very much!”

This game is made by Team Nonsense using RPG Maker 2000 and it was released on December 13th, 2010. The American fan translation group, Memories of Fear, translated this game and released it on January 8th, 2014.
